feed.title: Oracle Integration Cloud
feed.subtitle: This site provides a variety of Oracle Integration Cloud Tutorials that you can use to learn how to build integrations with Oracle Integation Cloud (OIC). You can learn more about Oracle Integration Cloud at: https://cloud.oracle.com/en_US/oic

entry.title: Tutorial 02: Using the Database Adapter
entry.content:
This tutorial explains how to uses the database adapter retrieve values from an Oracle database

Test
entry.summary: This tutorial explains how to uses the database adapter retrieve values from an Oracle database

entry.title: Tutorial 01: Using the REST Adapter
entry.content:
This tutorial explains how to use the REST adapter to allow a user to make a REST call using JSON to trigger an integration.

Test
entry.summary: This tutorial explains how to use the REST adapter to allow a user to make a REST call using JSON to trigger an integration.
